text: Ceratozamia mixeorum is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is endemic to the Sierra Mixe of Oaxaca state in southern Mexico. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== mixeorum Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Oaxaca Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia mixeorum
